item.title: Web UI Designer/Developer - Ecommerce (emeryville)
item.description:
Job Title: Web UI Designer/Developer - ecommerce
Group: Market-facing Design

Brief Description:

Does beautifully designed, easy-to-use software bring you tears of joy? Are you passionate about "Humancomputer interaction?" Can you generate buzz for the projects you create among colleagues and customers and justify the buzz with jaw-dropping results? Are you ready to connect millions of shoppers with thousands of small to medium businesses around the world using the power of the Internet?

If you answered "yes," Kagi (www.kagi.com), the pioneer of international ecommerce, has an opening for a UI Designer/Developer to help define, design, build, and market its incredible suite of ecommerce solutions.

As a Kagi User Interface Designer and Developer you will:

+ Design and enhance user experiences for Kagi's ecommerce solutions including the Kagi Online Store, Kagi Store Wizard, Kagi Registration Module, the Kagi Marketplace, the Kagi web site, and more
+ Build beautiful user interfaces even grandpa could understand
+ Write marketing copy to promote the benefits of all publicly released Kagi products and solutions
+ Create and develop new features and products using existing or emerging technologies
+ Offer creative input regarding go-to-market strategies
+ Assist with IT infrastructure planning
+ Interact with Kagi's clients to offer heroic customer service and obtain user feedback
+ Evangelize Kagi's solutions and innovative spirit

Desired Experience:

+ 3-5 years of web development experience
+ 1-2 years of sales or marketing experience a plus
+ A 4-year college degree (BA, BS, BFA) or equivalent

Proficiency in the following concepts and technologies:

+ User-interface Design / Humancomputer interaction
+ HTML, XML, XSL, CSS, JavaScript
+ At least one of the following popular web development languages (PHP, Python, Ruby/Rails, etc.)
+ Writing marketing material and technical documentation

Additional Requirements:

+ Strong written and verbal communication skills, in English
+ Communicates technical concepts clearly to beginners and experts
+ Outstanding problem solving and troubleshooting skills
+ Excellent organizational skills with a demonstrated ability to prioritize tasks and adhere to project schedules
+ Must work effectively with a small team or individually
+ Desire to clearly document or explain processes to colleagues
+ Unmatched attention to detail
+ Passion for excellence and innovation
+ Drive to overcome any challenge

We'll give some special attention to applicants with:

+ Experience working on large-scale, high-availability, international web-based services
+ Graphic design
+ Version control (CVS or Subversion)
+ Customer service experience
+ Proven abilities to leverage available resources to accomplish goals
+ Fluency in German, Japanese, French, Spanish, Chinese, Portuguese or Italian
+ Eye-catching design portfolios
+ Java, Cocoa, or iPhone development experience

Conveniently located near BART and Amtrak. We offer medical, dental, vision, and disability plans. Your salary will be commensurate with experience. Come work in an entrepreneurial, fast-paced environment filled with talented people. We need people who are passionate about shaping the future of our pioneering company. Come grow with us.

Email us with the subject "Market-facing Design Team."

Include your plain-text cover letter and resume in the body of your email.

Kagi is proud to be an equal opportunity employer.

Good luck!
